sentences.sContent: Under John Paul the Curia acquired a string of new “pontifical councils”, quasi-ministries that deal with everything from health workers to canon law.
sentences.sContent_eng: Under John Paul the Curia acquired a string of new “pontifical councils”, quasi-ministries that deal with everything from health workers to canon law.
sentences.sCn: 在约翰保罗时代教廷获得一系列新的“主教理事会” ，准部委处理一切从卫生工作者到教会法的事务。

words.tran: 自以为是的；武断的（等于pontifical）

trans.tranCn: 罗马教皇的, 主教的, 大祭司的
